DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To observe effect exercise train vascular endothelial function patient undergoing coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) alone phase III six month Cardiac rehabilitation program ( CRP ) . Methods : investigator contact patient undergoing CABG alone period 1 year participate CRP duration six month three weekly session 1 half hour duration . All patient underwent biochemical blood test , muscle strength test one repetition maximum ( 1-RM test ) upper low limb , 6-minute walk test ( 6MWT ) , evaluation endothelial function ( use flow-mediated vasodilation ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Exercise Training Vascular Endothelial Function Patients Submitted Coronary Artery Bypass Graft
DOC.detailed_description: Introduction The cardiac rehabilitation optimize cardiac patient 's physical , psychological , social functioning , addition stabilizing , slow , even reverse progression underlie atherosclerotic process , thereby reduce morbidity mortality . Patients recently myocardial infarction ; undergone coronary artery bypass graft ; undergone percutaneous coronary intervention ; heart transplantation candidate recipient ; stable chronic heart failure , peripheral arterial disease claudication , form CVD candidate eligible cardiac rehabilitation service ( , ) . Recently , study randomize clinical trial report efficacy exercise training ( ET ) independently format exercise : aerobic , resistance , combine exercise training patient coronary artery disease ( , ) , others study investigate effect ET vascular endothelial function patient stable coronary artery disease ( ) , ischemic heart disease ( ) , recent myocardial infarction ( 4 ) , chronic heart failure ( 3 , , ) . ET associate improvement endothelial function , oxidative stress , inflammation . Furthermore , ET promote beneficial effect cardiovascular outcome decrease hospitalization . Arterial endothelium function evaluate flow-mediated vasodilation ( FMD ) predictor long-term adverse cardiovascular outcome healthy subject ( ) . Vascular endothelial dysfunction independent risk factor cardiovascular event provide important prognostic data addition traditional risk factor ( ) . Endothelial dysfunction play important role patient coronary atherosclerosis ( acute chronic myocardial ischemia ) heart failure ( 3,5 , ) . Therefore , aim investigate effect combine exercise training vascular endothelial function sedentary patient submit coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) late phase . Methods The protocol approve local ethic committee Associação de Caridade Santa Casa Rio Grande Hospital , Rio Grande/RS - Brazil , protocol number 003/2013 . This study non-randomized clinical trial . The write informed consent obtain patient onset ET . The investigator invite consecutive patient submit CABG alone Cardiologic Hospital Doctor Pedro Bertoni Associação de Caridade Santa Casa Rio Grande period October , 2011 October , 2012 , reside city Rio Grande ( RS/Brazil ) , participate ET . The investigator exclude patient perform others cardiologic procedure CABG . All patient evaluate cardiologist , rank Functional Classification New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) class I II . Initially , twenty-four patient accept start participate ET , nine patient complete program end . The program exercise training ( ET ) employ 6 consecutive month 3 session per week . The training physical activity consist combination aerobic resistance exercise upper low limb . Each session include : ( 1 ) 5-minute warm-up , ( 2 ) 30 minute aerobic exercise ( perform treadmill stationary bike ) ; ( 3 ) 20 minute resistance exercise dumbbell upper limb ankle support low limb ( exercise preform diagonal ) consist 6 set 10 resistance exercise repeat upper limb , number set low limb ; ( 4 ) 5-minute cool-down , total ninety minute session per day ( 90min/day ) , two hundred seventy minute per week ( 270min/week ) ( ) . Initialy , aerobic exercise , maximal HR achieve establish 30-40 % HR rest , aerobic exercise limit symptom report patient . The initial weight dumbbell ankle establish 30-40 % one-repetition maximum test ( 1-RM test ) , gradually increase accord symptom report patient , without compensation trunk perform exercise , history muscle pain , muscle fatigue complete session . Heart rate ( HR ) , respiratory rate ( RR ) , saturation pulse oxygen , blood pressure measure beginning , middle end session . The intensity velocity exercise program progressively increase . The baseline assessment perform begin ET , consist : blood chemistry ( glycemia , insulin , glycohemoglobin , total- , high- , low-density lipoprotein cholesterol , triglyceride ) ; body mass index ; strength upper low limbs 1-RM test biceps brachialis quadriceps , respectively ; evaluation functional capacity ; evaluation vascular endothelial function . Cholesterol , triglyceride , high-density lipoprotein ( HDLc ) , glucose urea measure use LAB TEST commercial kit ( Lagoa Santa , MG , Brazil ) analyze LAB MAX 240® ( Tokyo , Japan ) equipment . The low density lipoprotein ( LDLc ) calculate Friedewald ` formula . Glucose level measure Trinder assay ( calorimetry ) equipment LAB MAX 240® ( Tokyo , Japan ) . The insulin assess chemiluminescence method use Immulite® DPC equipment ( Diagnostic Products Corporation - DPC , Los Angeles , CA , USA ) . The glycosylated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) determine enzymatic method use equipment LAB MAX 240® ( Tokyo , Japan ) . The 6-minutes walking test ( 6MWT ) use assess functional capacity individual , extremely important evaluate tolerance exercise capacity evaluation clinical prognosis patient cardiovascular pulmonary disease ( , ) . The 6MWT perform first day linear corridor 40 meter length , researcher perform test give verbal command patient , do best speed support , researcher ask patient physical sensation . Data collect , 3 minute end test respiratory rate ( RR ) , heart rate ( HR ) , saturation pulse portable pulse oximeter ( Nonin® , model 9500 , Plymouth , USA ) , blood pressure systemic . Flow-mediated vasodilation ( FMD ) measure evaluate arterial endothelium-dependent vasodilation use high-resolution vascular ultrasound ( Logiq P6 , GE Healtcare , GE Ultrasound Korea Ltda . ) accord American Heart Association Guideline ( ) adjustment ( , ) . Settings depth gain image keep constant throughout study . Briefly , change brachial artery diameter 60 reactive hyperemia , deflation cuff place around upper arm inflate 50 mmHg systolic blood pressure five min , compare baseline measurement . To evaluate basal blood flow flow immediately cuff release obtain later 15 cuff deflation use pulsed-wave Doppler velocity signal ( assess use Doppler bean-vessel angle ≤60º ) . The second evaluator perform measure blind first evaluator 's measure . Differences large 0.01 mm assessor ( mean vessel diameter ) repeat repeat . All data measure twice , final value present mean . A nutritional counseling perform , wich patient instruct avoid consumption saturate fat high-calorie foodstuff , intake dietary fiber , maintain good hydration implement fractionation meal throughout day , besides receive instruction food preparation , accord `` I Diretriz sobre Consumo de Gorduras e Saúde Cardiovascular '' `` Arquivos Brasileiros de Cardiologia '' `` Sociedade Brasileira de Cardiologia '' ( ) . All test repeat 6 month , result compare baseline test . The training program stop point . The data present mean ± SD . Distribution variable test Shapiro Wilk normality test . Baseline value compare value 6 month train program use pair t-test . A value P < 0.05 consider statistically significant .
